Koža ne mara zime
Vlažilne kreme jo bodo pomagale ohraniti v dobri kondiciji tudi pozimi, pomaga, če znižamo temperaturo gretja.
06 Nov 2019, 13:52 by U. S.



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOOhranimo lepo kožo tudi pozimi.



GETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTOMaska iz avokada je super za suho kožo. FOTOGRAFIJI: Guliver/Getty Images


Pozimi postane naša koža bolj suha, ne samo zaradi hladnejšega zraka, ampak tudi zaradi centralnega ogrevanja. Pomaga že, če znižamo temperaturo gretja, koristi tudi vlažilec zraka. V času ogrevalne sezone je odstotek vlage v zraku nizek, da bi bila koža dovolj navlažena, bi moralo biti v zraku več kot 30 odstotkov vlage.


Maska iz avokada je super za suho kožo. FOTOGRAFIJI: Guliver/Getty ImagesGETTY IMAGES/ISTOCKPHOTO

Pozimi je zelo pomembna uporaba vlažilne kreme, ki naj bo obenem hranilna. Nanesemo jo večkrat na dan, saj suha koža teže vpija in zadržuje vlažnost. Čistilna sredstva in toniki naj ne bodo na osnovi alkohola. Ne pozabimo na piling, s katerim odstranimo odmrle celice in obenem spodbudimo cirkulacijo. Pilinga ni treba kupovati, zlahka si ga naredimo sami doma: žličko sladkorja pomešamo z nekaj kapljicami olja ter z zmesjo nežno zmasiramo obraz, speremo z mlačno vodo.Ne le na obraz, tudi na roke moramo misliti, zato si omislimo kakovostno kremo. Namažemo se večkrat čez dan, vedno pa zvečer pred spanjem. In seveda balzam, s katerim bomo negovali ustnice. Te zahtevajo posebno nego, saj nimajo žlez lojnic, pa še manj vlage zadržujejo. Zaradi vetra in mrzlega zraka so pogosto razpokane, pri tem pa si pomagamo tako, da jih nenehno oblizujemo. A s tem jim ne koristimo, ravno nasprotno. Raje jih namažimo z balzamom, ki naj vsebuje karitejevo maslo in E-vitamin.Poleg tega kar najbolj omejimo izpostavljenost dejavnikom, ki koži vzamejo naravna olja. Voda, zlasti vroča, jo izsušuje. Za umivanje, prhanje, tudi kopeli (in pomivanje posode) se priporoča mlačna voda; če si pripravimo kopel, ji dodamo nekaj kapljic olja, pri prhanju uporabljamo kremna mila. Pomembno je, da kože ne zdrgnemo do suhega, ampak jo le nežno popivnamo in še malce vlažno namažemo s kremo oziroma mlekom za telo. Tako jo boste nahranili in ohranili njeno mehkobo.In ne pozabimo na zadosten vnos tekočine. Čeprav pozimi žeje ne občutimo tako kot poleti, moramo popiti vsaj liter in pol tekočine na dan, najraje vode, telo pa bodo prijetno ogreli tudi (nesladkani) zeliščni čaji. Poleg tega uživamo hrano, ki vsebuje veliko vode in vitaminov, denimo jabolka, pomaranče, korenje, poskrbimo za primeren vnos vitamina C, da ohranimo proizvodnjo kolagena. V domači kuhinji si pripravimo masko za obraz: suhost kože bomo ublažili z avokadom, medom, jogurtom in banano.
V domači kuhinji pripravimo negovalne maske, ki bodo kožo nahranile in preprečile izsuševanje.
Avokadovo masko naredimo takole: krhelj avokada pretlačimo z vilicami in dodamo nekaj kapljic oljčnega olja ali malce medu. Pustimo delovati 15 minut, speremo z mlačno vodo in nanesemo kremo, ki jo uporabljamo. Ali pa pretlačimo pol banane, dodamo žličko medu in žlico jogurta. Nanesemo za očiščeno kožo obraza in vratu, z mlačno vodo speremo po 15 minutah.
text:
Skin doesn't like winter
Moisturizing creams will help keep it in good shape even in winter, it helps if we lower the heating temperature.
06 Nov 2019, 13:52 by U. S.



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTWe keep beautiful skin in winter.



GETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTOM avocado mask is great for dry skin. PHOTOS: Gulliver / Getty Images


In winter, our skin becomes more dry, not only because of the cooler air, but also because of central heating. It also helps to lower the heating temperature, and it also benefits from a humidifier. During the heating season, the percentage of humidity in the air is low, in order for the skin to be sufficiently moisturized, there should be more than 30 percent humidity in the air.


The avocado mask is great for dry skin. PHOTOS: Gulliver / Getty ImagesGETTY IMAGES / ISTOCKPHOTO

In winter, it is very important to use a moisturizer that should be nourishing at the same time. It is applied several times a day, as dry skin absorbs and retains moisture. Cleaning agents and tonics should not be alcohol-based. Let's not forget the exfoliation, which removes dead cells and at the same time stimulates circulation. It is not necessary to buy exfoliation, it is easy to make it at home: a spoonful of sugar is mixed with a few drops of oil and gently massage the face with a mixture, rinse with lukewarm water. We apply several times during the day, always at night before going to bed. And of course the balm with which we will nourish our lips. These require special care as they do not have sebaceous glands, but retain even less moisture. Due to the wind and cold air, they are often cracked, and we help each other by constantly licking them. But we do not benefit from them, on the contrary. Rather, they should be oiled with a balm containing shea butter and E-vitamin. In addition, we limit exposure to the factors that natural oils take in the skin. Water, especially hot water, drains it. Wash water is recommended for washing, showering, baths (and dishwashing); if we prepare a bath, we add a few drops of oil to it, we use cream soaps when showering. It is important not to rub the skin dry, but only gently soak it and moisturize it a little more with body cream or milk. This will nourish it and keep it soft. And let's not forget enough fluid intake. Although we do not feel thirsty in the winter like we do in summer, we need to drink at least a liter and a half of liquid a day, preferably water, and the body will also enjoy warm (unsweetened) herbal teas. In addition, we consume foods that contain a lot of water and vitamins, such as apples, oranges, carrots, and provide adequate intake of vitamin C to maintain collagen production. We make a face mask in the home kitchen: we will soften skin dryness with avocado, honey, yogurt and banana.
In the home kitchen we prepare nourishing masks that will nourish the skin and prevent it from drying out.
To make an avocado mask: Fill the avocado bowl with a fork and add a few drops of olive oil or some honey. Leave it on for 15 minutes, rinse with lukewarm water and apply the cream that is used. Or beat half a banana, add a teaspoon of honey and a tablespoon of yogurt. Apply for cleansed face and neck skin, rinse with lukewarm water after 15 minutes.
